title: Insulin therapy in people who have dysglycemia and type 2 diabetes mellitus: can it offer both cardiovascular protection and beta-cell preservation?
abstract: Mounting evidence suggests that insulin therapy may reduce risk for CV events while preserving beta-cell function, and several continuing long-term CV trials are testing these hypotheses explicitly.
